TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WasmerNativeHandle extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: This wraps a native handle and takes care of disposing the handles they wrap. Due to the design of the Wasmer API that can
Docs.remarks: produce a lot of values that need to be destroyed, and in an effort to balance the complexity that it would involve, this queues releases of data on either construction or on the main thread dispose method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Disposes the object, releasing the unmanaged resources associated with it.
Returns the last error message that was raised by the Wasmer Runtime
